title: How to Draw a Circus Tent

steps.headline: Draw the basic shapes that form the circus tent.
steps.description: Draw a rectangle and add a triangle on top.

steps.headline: Using the basic shapes as guide, start drawing slight curves on the lines to make the tent look like its made out of canvas or some sort of sturdy fabric.
Draw the entrance of the tent.
steps.description: Draw a slightly bent diagonal line and find its center. Draw another line to form a small triangle which will serve as the entrance.

steps.headline: Draw the flag on top of the circus tent.
Add the stripe pattern which has become a trademark for circus tents.

text: Draw the basic shapes that form the circus tent. Draw a rectangle and add a triangle on top. Using the basic shapes as guide, start drawing slight curves on the lines to make the tent look like its made out of canvas or some sort of sturdy fabric.  Draw the entrance of the tent. Draw a slightly bent diagonal line and find its center. Draw another line to form a small triangle which will serve as the entrance. Draw the flag on top of the circus tent.  Add the stripe pattern which has become a trademark for circus tents.  Color in the rest!
